title: Ward Skins
body: Anyone else lose ward skins I lost 1 out of the 2 my favorite one too I lost my project ward skin and my friend lost 2 of his 3.

replies.body: Are you still experiencing this issue?  Let me know if your wards are showing up now, or if you're still unable to see them!
Yes I am still haven't shown up.

Thanks for the follow up!  It sounds strange that you would suddenly be missing ward skins, and I wasn't able to find anything out of the ordinary for your specific account.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can provide context on your account's purchase history.  That should help clear things up!

Hey GodGutana,

It is currently a known issue, please read [this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/pOslJHiQ-knownward-skins-missing) thread for details.
I lost 2 of mine too! I lost my SKT and Battlecast ward skins. What the heck happened this patch to make us lose ward skins? This seriously needs to be fixed!
Yup! I have also lost a ward skin! It was just one, but...RITO PLES. What happened?
